sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useQuery } from '@tanstack/react-query' function Details() { const { id } = useParams(); const { isLoading, error, pokemonDetail } = useQuery({ queryKey: ['pokemon'], queryFn: () => fetch('https://pokeapi.co/api/v2/pokemon/'+id) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => { const pkmName = data.name.charAt().toUpperCase() + data.name.substring(1) return { nombre: pkmName, id: data.id, type: data.types.map(type => type.type.name).join(", "), stats:data.stats.map(stats => stats.base_stat).join(", "), height: data.height, weight: data.weight }; }) }); if (isLoading) return 'Loading...' if (error) return 'An error has occurred: ' + error.message return (
Nombre: {pokemonDetail.nombre}
Tipo: {pokemonDetail.type}
Altura: {pokemonDetail.height}''
Peso: {pokemonDetail.weight} lbs.



Estadisticas Base
{pokemonDetail.stats}

Más Info

) } export default Details
